1bfb4604-9c54-44dd-805c-e978de8c0881.description: A Certified SOA Professional has a proven understanding of the fundamentals of services, microservices, APIs and service-oriented architecture, as well as common technologies and business considerations.
1bfb4604-9c54-44dd-805c-e978de8c0881.name: Certified SOA Professional

badge_template_activities.title: COMPLETE ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THREE OPTIONS:
● Pass exams S90.01B and S90.02B
● Pass S90.01B and S90.03B
● Achieve any SOACP certification (this certification is automatically attained by achieving any other SOACP certification)

a7f33d09-eb19-45e5-9475-6f1631f20509.description: A Certified Cloud Professional has a proven understanding of cloud computing concepts, models and business considerations, and has further demonstrated proficiency in fundamental technology and security-related areas of cloud computing.
a7f33d09-eb19-45e5-9475-6f1631f20509.name: Certified Cloud Professional

badge_template_activities.title: COMPLETE ONE OF THE FOLLOWING TWO OPTIONS:
● Pass module-specific exams C90.01, C90.02
● Pass any complete combined CCP exam (this certification is automatically attained by achieving any other CCP certification)

3e406001-b5be-445e-a6a9-0e4f2775034c.description: A Certified Big Data Professional has a proven understanding of Big Data concepts and technologies, and has further demonstrated proficiency in fundamental areas of Big Data, including analysis, analytics, models and practices.
3e406001-b5be-445e-a6a9-0e4f2775034c.name: Certified Big Data Professional

badge_template_activities.title: COMPLETE ONE OF THE FOLLOWING TWO OPTIONS:
● Pass module-specific exams B90.01 and B902
● Pass any complete combined BDSCP exam (this certification is automatically attained by achieving any other BDSCP certification)

948f2ec6-e569-4efb-8cac-f36c6f068002.description: A Certified SOA Professional has a proven understanding of the fundamentals of services and service-oriented architecture, and has met minimum SOACP qualifications by demonstrating proficiency in at least one additional area.
948f2ec6-e569-4efb-8cac-f36c6f068002.name: Certified SOA Professional (GEN 1)

badge_template_activities.title: Pass exam S90.01A and one additional SOACP exam

efcf5a06-d7cc-48fd-9690-1e008d417dd6.description: A Certified Big Data Science Professional has demonstrated proficiency in fundamental Big Data technologies and practices, including analysis, analytics and mechanisms common to contemporary Big Data environments and tools.
efcf5a06-d7cc-48fd-9690-1e008d417dd6.name: Certified Big Data Science Professional

badge_template_activities.title: COMPLETE ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THREE OPTIONS:

● Pass module-specific exams B90.01, B90.02, B90.03
● Pass exam B90.03 (if you are already a BDSCP certification holder)

d0920965-abff-4bfe-9ad2-2410e6e0d329.description: A Certified Microservice Architect has demonstrated proficiency in the technology architecture models and mechanics of microservice implementations and containerization environments, through the mastery of patterns, practices and industry-standard technologies required to engineer contemporary microservices.
d0920965-abff-4bfe-9ad2-2410e6e0d329.name: Certified Microservice Architect

badge_template_activities.title: COMPLETE ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THREE OPTIONS:

● Pass partial combined exam S90.MSA (if you are already a SOACP certification holder)

788e6067-b220-46b4-a435-ef478b6d5351.description: A Certified SOA Architect has demonstrated proficiency in the technology architecture models and mechanics of service, microservice and service composition implementations, through the mastery of patterns, principles, practices and industry-standard technologies required to engineer modern-day services-based solutions.
788e6067-b220-46b4-a435-ef478b6d5351.name: Certified SOA Architect

badge_template_activities.title: COMPLETE ONE OF THE FOLLOWING FOUR OPTIONS:
● Pass combined exam S90.SAR
● Pass module-specific exams S90.01B, S90.02B, S90.03B, S90.07B, S90.08B
● Pass partial combined exam S90.SAR (if you have already passed exams S90.01B and S90.02B)
● Pass exam S90.ARB (if you are already an SOA Architect Gen 1 certification holder)

ed9d60be-3418-4d1a-b8a1-77c94bb11ae3.description: A Certified Cybersecurity Specialist understands common types of cyber security challenges, including cyber attacks, cyber crime and cyber fraud. Along with a solid understanding of the technologies and practices used to counter and prevent common cyber attacks and threats and investigate suspicious online activity, the Certified Cybersecurity Specialist is also required to be proficient in hardening and protecting a range of digital assets.
ed9d60be-3418-4d1a-b8a1-77c94bb11ae3.name: Certified Cybersecurity Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: ● Pass exam CS90.01

7c07ffea-5ec8-475f-8260-694d744d5aa5.description: A Certified SOA Architect has demonstrated proficiency in the mechanics of SOA through the physical design of service-oriented technology architectures, service-oriented solutions, and related infrastructure.
7c07ffea-5ec8-475f-8260-694d744d5aa5.name: Certified SOA Architect (GEN 1)

819d0c92-fc3a-4dcd-b36a-370c7fb48c3a.description: A Certified Big Data Consultant has demonstrated proficiency across a range of key Big Data topics, with a particular focus on Big Data analytics and analysis techniques, as well data processing and storage. The breadth of this skill-set enables a Certified Big Data Consultant to perform in a variety of capacities as a member of a Big Data solutions team.
819d0c92-fc3a-4dcd-b36a-370c7fb48c3a.name: Certified Big Data Consultant

16b6dab3-df74-47c4-9588-059ba983838d.description: A Certified Cloud Technology Professional has demonstrated proficiency in the concepts, IT resources, and implementation mechanisms used to assemble and evolve cloud platforms via common utilization models.

3e1cb455-7360-46a1-b32d-7ecf6827fafe.description: A Certified Cloud Architect has demonstrated proficiency in the technology architecture that underlies cloud platforms and cloud-based IT resources and solutions, and has mastered the hands-on application of design patterns, principles, and practices used to engineer and evolve such environments.
3e1cb455-7360-46a1-b32d-7ecf6827fafe.name: Certified Cloud Architect

c6ba97e2-64f0-4d0f-82d1-888aecc6d26b.description: A Certified Machine Learning Specialist has demonstrated proficiency in machine learning methods, models and algorithms and can design scalable machine learning systems capable of solving complex business problems.

6c41ed69-b56e-4810-a99c-39af2c138340.description: A Certified Service Governance Specialist has demonstrated proficiency in project delivery methodologies and the definition and evolution of service governance frameworks, precepts and processes in support of organizational and technological service governance requirements.
6c41ed69-b56e-4810-a99c-39af2c138340.name: Certified Service Governance Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: COMPLETE ONE OF THE FOLLOWING THREE OPTIONS:
● Pass combined exam S90.SGO
● Pass module-specific exams S90.01B, S90.03B, S90.15B, S90.16B, S90.17B
● Pass partial combined exam S90.SGO (if you already passed exams S90.01B and S90.03B)

a47d4c6e-6fac-4922-b393-d60f597869d5.description: A Certified SOA .NET Developer has proficiency with the development of distributed solutions using .NET programming technologies and tools, and has attained proven mastery of applying service-orientation to the programming and implementation of services-based .NET solutions.
a47d4c6e-6fac-4922-b393-d60f597869d5.name: Certified SOA .NET Developer (GEN 1)

9fe10e41-a778-468c-a736-1c9f864415c4.description: The Fundamental Microservice Technology Training digital badge is issued to learners that complete this course online and pass the self-test, as well as attendees of select Arcitura workshops that include this course.
9fe10e41-a778-468c-a736-1c9f864415c4.name: Fundamental Microservice Technology Training

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Designated Fundamental Microservices & Service Technology Course or Course Content

a3b5f2ed-e59d-419b-bf06-f62cf7bd9c69.description: A Certified Junior Big Data Science Professional has a demonstrated understanding of fundamental Big Data concepts, practices and tools, including techniques associated with data analysis, analytics and machine learning.
a3b5f2ed-e59d-419b-bf06-f62cf7bd9c69.name: Junior Big Data Science Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Pass Exam B90.J01

61de5cef-4c2c-4a29-8b8b-c6bb8d19bead.description: A Certified Junior Cloud Computing Professional has a demonstrated understanding of fundamental cloud computing concepts, models, technologies and practices, including cloud delivery and deployment models, cloud platform characteristics and common applications for cloud technologies.
61de5cef-4c2c-4a29-8b8b-c6bb8d19bead.name: Junior Cloud Computing Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Pass Exam C90.J01

3d9b39d8-4fb3-46ef-a648-611635e8b5bd.description: A Certified Junior Digital Transformation Professional has a demonstrated understanding of fundamental concepts, models and practices associated with the technologies and fields of practice that comprise modern-day digital technology transformation solutions.
